title: Indian actor Gippi Grewal arrives in city
content:
LAHORE, Jan 20 (APP):Famous Indian actor Gippi Grewal arrived here through Wagha border on Monday on a three-day visit.
Talking to APP, Gippi Grewal said that he had been longing for visiting his religious places including Nankana Sahib and Kartarpur Sahib in Pakistan. He extended his gratitude to Prime Minister Imran Khan and his Advisor Zulfi Bukhari, who turned his dream into a reality, as “Today, I am in Pakistan to perform my esteemed ritual at our worship places here.”
Gippi Grewal said, “I feel no difference here since Pakistan and India have similar culture and values.”
He visited Janamasthan Baba Guru Nanaka at Nankana Sahib and performed his religious rituals after which he came back to Lahore.
The Indian actor will visit his village situated in Faisalabad district on Tuesday.
During his stay in Pakistan, he will also visit Gurdwara Kartarpur.
